```{r}
library(highcharter)
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

data("gapminder")

gapminder
```

Nesting:

```{r}
gapminder <- gapminder %>% 
  nest(-country) %>% 
  mutate(chart = map(data, ~ hchart(., "line", hcaes(year, pop))))
```

Now:

```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  sample_n(10) %>% 
  select(country, chart) %>% 
  # mutate(chart = map(chart, htmltools::browsable)) %>% 
  mutate(chart = map(chart, htmltools::HTML, text = "")) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```
